about_the_game:
This economy based card game pits your strategic skills against friends, family, and other players online! Just hop in, create or join a room, and fight to amass the mountains of gold contained in the Ancient Egyptian City of Abydos!

Contains:
- Vast Economic Concepts with Banking, Stocks, and Allocation for Strategic Card Play!
- Gold Generation Distribution and Card Abilities for Exciting Combat!
- Fun Themes and Characters Inspired by a modernized Egyptian mythos!
- Beautiful Pixel Art Aesthetics and Relaxing, Catchy Music!
- Highly Entrancing to Play with Friends and Family!

It's also FREE!

Built by one passionate developer, I sincerely hope you enjoy the experience. Thanks!
